subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Arnold Palmer will be on the first tee at Augusta again, and that’s enough for anyone who remembers seeing him when real soldiers at nearby Fort Gordon were the original enlistees in Arnie’s Army.
snippet: Arnold Palmer will be on the first tee at Augusta again, and that’s enough for anyone who remembers seeing him when real soldiers at nearby Fort Gordon were the original enlistees in Arnie’s Army.
